txt.en: Build a snowman at a snowpile

This is one of Virgil's snowmen. It is craftily posed and wearing a pair of mittens.\n\nThis snowman features a carrot nose as well as sticks, acorns, and coal. Perhaps you can find what you need scattered about Frostbluff.
Found a pair of mittens in Winter-home
Found a carrot near the chicken coops
Gathered coal near the servants' oven
Virgil Greenfield wants you to help him fill the snowman field outside of Winter-home.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends. </rgb>
Gathered acorns among the trees of Frostbluff ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Built a mitten-wearing snowman at a snowpile
Built a mitten-wearing snowman

'Ah, an excellent choice. I'm rather fond of this one.

'If you're having trouble finding a carrot, there may be some by the chickens, assuming they haven't picked them apart yet. Perhaps you can borrow a pair of mittens from someone in town?

'There are quite a few ways you can use this snowman. Pick a good spot, and I'm sure you will come up with something clever!'

This is one of Virgil's snowmen. It is craftily posed and wearing a pair of mittens.\n\nThis snowman features a carrot nose as well as sticks, acorns, and coal. Perhaps you can find what you need scattered about Frostbluff.
The materials you need to replicate Virgil's snowman can be found around Frostbluff.\n\nIn order to replicate Virgil's snowman, you will need to gather the right materials.
The snowman-field lies outside Winter-home.\n\nNow that you have gathered the necessary supplies, you should head out to the field and find a snowpile to build your snowman.

'Ah, an excellent choice. I'm rather fond of this one.

'If you're having trouble finding a carrot, there may be some by the chickens, assuming they haven't picked them apart yet. Perhaps you can borrow a pair of mittens from someone in town?

'There are quite a few ways you can use this snowman. Pick a good spot, and I'm sure you will come up with something clever!'
Find a pair of mittens in Winter-home
Find a carrot near the chicken coops
Gather coal near the servants' oven
Gather acorns among the trees of Frostbluff ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
A Mitten-wearing Snowman
